meanings.definition: A widely cultivated plant of the nightshade family, with funnel-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with colorful petunias.
meanings.sent2: I planted a beautiful petunia in my backyard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide his acorns in the petunia pot.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a blooming petunia in the dull room.
meanings.sent5: The sweet fragrance of the petunia lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: A plant of the nightshade family, native to tropical America, with brightly colored funnel-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The vibrant petunia brightened up the garden.
meanings.sent2: She admired the delicate petals of the petunia.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played hide and seek among the petunias.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as radiant as a blooming petunia.
meanings.sent5: The vivid hues of the petunia caught everyone's attention.
